  • Method Details

    • createBucket

      public AccessorBucket createBucket(String clientId, String technicalBucketName, boolean isPublic) throws CcsAlreadyExistException, CcsOperationException
      Create bucket from client Id and technicalBucketName
      Parameters:
      clientId - Format client ID use to identify client
      technicalBucketName - Technical Bucket Name
      isPublic - True means replicate with replicator module
      Returns:
      AccessorBucket add on Database and in object storage
      Throws:
      CcsAlreadyExistException
      CcsOperationException

    • getBucket

      public AccessorBucket getBucket(String technicalBucketName, boolean external, String clientId, String opId) throws CcsNotExistException, CcsDeletedException, CcsOperationException
      Get Bucket information from bucket technical name
      Parameters:
      technicalBucketName - Bucket technical name
      Returns:
      AccessorBucket found with technical name
      Throws:
      CcsNotExistException
      CcsDeletedException
      CcsOperationException

    • getBuckets

      public Collection<AccessorBucket> getBuckets(String clientId) throws CcsOperationException
      Get All buckets in Storgate
      Returns:
      the list of Buckets
      Throws:
      CcsOperationException

    • checkBucket

      public boolean checkBucket(String technicalBucketName, boolean fullCheck, boolean external, String clientId, String opId) throws CcsOperationException
      Check if Bucket exists
      Parameters:
      technicalBucketName - Bucket technical name
      fullCheck - True to check Object Storage
      external - True to check remotely if not found locally
      clientId - the clientId
      opId - the OperationId
      Returns:
      True if it exists
      Throws:
      CcsOperationException

    • deleteBucket

      public AccessorBucket deleteBucket(String clientId, String technicalBucketName, boolean external) throws CcsNotExistException, CcsDeletedException, CcsOperationException, CcsNotAcceptableException
      Delete bucket from technical bucket name
      Parameters:
      clientId - Client ID used to identify client
      technicalBucketName - Bucket technical name
      external - true to send replication message on replicator
      Returns:
      the associated DTO- deleted
      Throws:
      CcsNotExistException
      CcsDeletedException
      CcsOperationException
      CcsNotAcceptableException
